pages.text: Howlite is one of the new types of resources found in this world. $(br)We do not currently know how it got here, but we know that it can be used to $(#f00)"corrupt" $()certain blocks.
As implied, this is the Howlite Ore. It can rarely be found deep underground in the Overworld.

This is the most common source of Howlite. Scattered around the world are Geodes containing these little guys. $(br)Upon breaking one without a Silk Touch pickaxe, you will be rewarded a singular piece of dust.

Howlite dust is the main product of smelting $(item)Howlite Ore$() and the byproduct of destroying $(item)Howlite Clusters$(). Since our smelting methods are still inefficient, it is recommended to keep the ore until more efficient ways of smelting and extracting are found. $(br)As for the clusters, unless mined carefully, they will always drop dust when broken.
